mapper.update: update R_User_Org_Invite set OrgSn = #{orgsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserEmail = #{useremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsPend = #{ispend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsOldUser = #{isolduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where InvSn = #{invsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select InvSn, OrgSn, UsrSn, UserEmail, IsPend, IsOldUser from R_User_Org_Invite
